SELECT s.cart_id AS cartId, s.room_id AS roomId, s.customer_id AS customerId, s.desired_check_in_at AS desiredCheckInAt, s.desired_check_out_at AS desiredCheckOutAt, s.adult_count AS adultCount, s.child_count AS childCount,
r.accommodation_id AS accommodationId, r.room_name AS roomName, r.checkin_time AS checkinTime, r.checkout_time AS checkoutTime, r.standard_capacity AS standardCapacity, r.maximum_capacity AS maximumCapacity FROM SHOPPING_CART s JOIN ROOM r on s.room_id = r.room_id JOIN CUSTOMER c on s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_CART (room_id, customer_id, adult_count, child_count) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{customerId},#{adultCount},#{childCount})
